item.title: Those Who Lose Dreaming Are Lost - OOTD 12
item.description:
Those Who Lose Dreaming Are Lost - OOTD 12

Sometimes it's easy to forget how fortunate we are to live in London and have iconic structures such as Tower Bridge and St Paul's Cathedral literally a tube stop or two away.

item.title: The North / South Divide
item.description:
The North / South Divide

Continuing on from my previous travels I once again ended up in my home away from home - Leeds.

item.title: Flower In The Crannied Wall
item.description:
Flower In The Crannied Wall

I moved to the UK when I was 11 years old and have grown to appreciate it's rich history and complex relationship with religion through the ages. Although I try not to debate the topic it's difficult to deny the impact religion has had on architecture.

item.title: Withings Activité Steel Lookbook - OOTD 9
item.description:
Withings Activité Steel Lookbook - OOTD 9

Over the last few weeks I've been getting comfortable with my Activite Steel smartwatch from Withings as the ever growing presence of technology means we have to wear sensors all over our bodies. I did a small comparison of fitness trackers so if you're still undecided that post should give you some guidance.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S7 Fitness Preview
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S7 Fitness Preview

It's only been about a year since Samsung released the Galaxy S6 and S6 Edge as its new flagship smartphones. Built to satisfy millions of customers and maintain steady competition with the Apple iPhone 6 and 6S, these devices were very well received.

item.title: A Sit Down With the Shoreditch Sketcher
item.description:
A Sit Down With the Shoreditch Sketcher

It's often quite rare to sit down with someone with such a unique outlook on the world it inspires you with ideas and yet my meeting with Phil Dean aka. The Shoreditch Sketcher did exactly that.

item.title: Royal Observatory, Greenwich // A Fresh Start
item.description:
Royal Observatory, Greenwich // A Fresh Start

There's something I've been meaning to talk about for a while and to put it bluntly it's the very serious issue of mental health.

item.title: A Stroll Through Covent Garden - OOTD 8
item.description:
A Stroll Through Covent Garden - OOTD 8

It's easy to take London for granted and forget that a number of areas were really run down and derelict only a century or two ago. Covent Garden for example fell into disrepute in the 1600's as the area began to get filled up with taverns, theatres and brothels.

item.title: Photography Journal 19
item.description:
Photography Journal 19

I don't know how many of you have this problem but my laptop is filled with multiple gigabytes worth of photos that never see the light of day. Although each post is carefully curated there are hundreds of snaps that simply don't work and unfortunately have to be binned however pretty I found them at the time.

item.title: Fitness Wearables Comparison & Review
item.description:
Fitness Wearables Comparison & Review

Wearable technology or wearables as they're commonly known are wearable fashion devices that have grown in prominence recently thanks to products such as the Apple iWatch as well as our own insatiable appetite for personal data.
